comments:

This bug occurs with both the C99 and DOM parsers.

(In reply to comment #1)
> This bug occurs with both the C99 and DOM parsers.

Sure, the bug is by no means related to parsing/indexer, it's a bug in the 
ChangeBuildConfigActionBase. 

Ken, can you have a look?
*** Bug 192140 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
I'm not sure why I couldn't reproduce this but I fixed where the NPE was happening.
